actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

actions.name: Heat Metal (1/Day)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature wearing or holding a metal object. Hit: 9 (2d8) fire damage. If a creature is holding the object and suffers damage  it makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw  dropping the object on a failure.

actions.name: Fire Breath (1/Day)
actions.desc: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in the area makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw  taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: Death Burst
special_abilities.desc: When the mephit dies, it explodes into lava. Each creature within 5 feet makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless, the mephit is indistinguishable from a small magma flow.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: A mephit doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.
